span.strong: This page is designed for parents and students of Jefferson City Schools to access updated materials related to the COVID-19 virus. Please check this website for the most up-to-date information. In addition, if you have not received email updates related to COVID-19 from Jefferson City Schools, please check in Infinite Campus Parent Portal to ensure that the correct email is in our records.

h2.div: What is the Jefferson City School System doing?

span.strong: Ensuring your child's health is always important to Jefferson City Schools. We are currently monitoring updates related to COVID-19, and will continue to update this site with the latest information. Here are current initiatives in place to maintain a healthy environment at school.

li.p: Reviewing our Emergency Procedures and Preparedness Plans
Reviewing our plan for Instructional Continuity
Please see our Parent Resource Page for JCS - Distance Learning

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Monitoring field trip destinations to ensure students are not traveling to or through cities experiencing an outbreak (as defined by the

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Reminding students and staff about respiratory etiquette and handwashing

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Reminding parents to keep students at home who have symptoms of a respiratory illness

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Developing information-sharing systems specific to this potential outbreak with other organizations and governmental agencies

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Providing extra restroom breaks with additional time to allow for proper hand-washing

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Monitoring absenteeism and notifying local health officials about large increases in student or staff absences

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Strengthening procedures to isolate and send home students and staff who are sick at school as soon as symptoms present

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.em: uses products proven effective in killing

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Creating communications plans specific to the potential outbreak for use with the school community (

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

li.p: Enhanced sanitization of classrooms, restrooms, and food service areas.
Consistent sanitization of classroom devices (Every teacher provided with sanitizing solution for all shared classroom devices)

li.p: Students and parents may refer to Distance Learning Resource Page for each school.

JCS will provide breakfast and lunch items for those needing meals. Please see the attached flyer for site pick up times and locations. Contact Director of Nutrition, Sue Hamm, for more information at shamm@jeffcityschools.org.
FoodFinder: A safe and secure way to find food assistance near you

Free/Reduced Meals: If your income status has changed, please go online at www.lunchapplication.com and complete a free and reduced meal application to ensure current eligibility status once we return to school.
Please see the attached flyer for JCS counseling and social work services.

Jackson County Family Connections: A collaborative non-profit organization that links businesses, agencies and citizens together for the betterment of children and families in Jackson County to fill the gap of need.

li.p: Hearing Impaired: CDC developed a series of American Sign Language videos that offer important information about COVID-19 for students and families that are hearing impaired.

a.strong: Executive Order from Governor Brian Kemp

span.strong: , campus closures have been extended for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Distance and Digital Learning will continue April 6, 2020.

a.strong: Gov. Brian Kemp - Shelter in Place Order - April 2, 2020

span.strong: Fingerprinting has been suspended until further notice.
All athletic events and extra curricular activities have been cancelled.
School-related activities and field trips have been cancelled until further notice. Please contact school administrators for more information .
JES and JA playgrounds are closed.
All tennis courts and outdoor basketball courts are closed.
All fields and the track are closed until further notice.
